titles.title: Education for New Dispositions on Stigma Act

To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants to institutions of higher education to develop programs and materials to educate students who have a substance use disorder on treatment options for such disorder, and for other purposes.
Education for New Dispositions on Stigma Act
END Stigma Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Education for New Dispositions on Stigma Act or the END Stigma Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants to institutions of higher education to educate students about substance use disorders.
